document.id: Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council Res. No. SI-R19-004
document.heading: PUEBLO DE SAN ILDEFONSO COUNCIL RESOLUTION NO. SI-R19-004
Authorizing the 2019-2022 Contracting of the Higher Education Scholarship Program Through Public Law 93-638
document.preamble: At a duly called meeting of the Council of San Ildefonso Pueblo on the 30th day of January, 2019, the following Resolution was adopted:

container.heading: Authorizing the 2019-2022 Contracting of the Higher Educatin Scholarship Program through Public Law 93-638

annotation.doc: Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council Res. No. SI-R19-004

recital.text: the Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Pueblo") is a sovereign and self-governing Tribe, recognized as such by the United States of America; and

para.text: The Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Pueblo') is a sovereign and self-governing Tribe, recognized as such by the United States of America.

recital.text: the Council is authorized to make laws for the Pueblo de San Ildefonso pursuant to Section 5 of the Agreement, the governing document of the pueblo; and

para.text: The Council is authorized to make laws for the Pueblo de San Ildefonso pursuant to Section 5 of the Agreement, the governing document of the pueblo.

recital.text: the Pueblo, by and through United States Public Law 93-638, has contracted and administered key functions for assistance to the Tribe through the Bureau of Indian Affairs (BIA) to include the Higher Education Scholarship Program; and

para.text: The Pueblo, by and through United States Public Law 93-638, has contracted and administered key functions for assistance to the Tribe through the Bureau of Indian Affairs (BIA) to include the Higher Education Scholarship Program.

recital.text: the Higher Education Scholarship Program, receives funding from the BIA to administer the Scholarship Program in compliance with the respective scope of work; and

para.text: The Higher Education Scholarship Program, receives funding from the BIA to administer the Scholarship Program in compliance with the respective scope of work.

recital.text: the Pueblo wishes to continue contracting the Higher Education Scholarship Program for a four (4)-year period, 2019 through 2022.

para.text: The Pueblo wishes to continue contracting the Higher Education Scholarship Program for a four (4)-year period, 2019 through 2022.

recital.text: that the Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council hereby approves submission of the Application for Contract for the Higher Education Scholarship Program for a four-year term (2019-2022); and

section.text: The Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council hereby approves submission of the Application for Contract for the Higher Education Scholarship Program for a four-year term (2019-2022).

recital.text: the Pueblo de San Ildefonso wishes to enter into a Public Law 93-638 contract for these funds, and

section.text: The Pueblo de San Ildefonso wishes to enter into a Public Law 93-638 contract for these funds.

recital.text: that the Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council hereby approves and adopts this resolution in accordance with the requirements of the Agreement, according to the published Council procedures, and authorizes and directs the Governor, or his designee, to take such actions as deemed necessary to carry out the intent of this resolution.

section.text: The Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council hereby approves and adopts this resolution in accordance with the requirements of the Agreement, according to the published Council procedures, and authorizes and directs the Governor, or his designee, to take such actions as deemed necessary to carry out the intent of this resolution.

procedural-data.text: The foregoing resolution was duly voted upon by the Council on January 30 , 2019, at a meeting with a vote of 8 in favor, 0 opposed, 1 abstaining and 1 absent (Governor presiding and not voting) pursuant to the authority vested in the Council by the Agreement of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso.
DELIVERY OF THE RESOLUTION TO THE GOVERNOR:

Resolution No. SI-R19-004 was presented to the Governor of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso on the 30th day of January, 2019, pursuant to the Governing document of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Agreement"), GOVERNOR, Sec. 4(c), and will become effective after signature by the Governor or veto override by the Council.
